code: public static String get(String... properties) {     for (String property : properties) {         try {             String override = System.getProperty(property).             override = (override != null) ? override : System.getenv(property).             if (override != null) {                 return override.             }         } catch (Throwable ex) {             System.err.println("Could not resolve '" + property + "' as system property: " + ex).         }     }     return null. }
